thread.title: Queensland Has Released Australia's First Clinical Guidelines For Medicinal Cannabis - BuzzFeed News
thread.title_full: Queensland Has Released Australia's First Clinical Guidelines For Medicinal Cannabis - BuzzFeed News

author: Brad Esposito
title: Queensland Has Released Australia's First Clinical Guidelines For Medicinal Cannabis - BuzzFeed News
text:
View this image ›
Jack Guez / AFP / Getty Images
ID: 10408665 “Medical practitioners have not had information in a domestic setting to allow them to use or understand the use of medicinal cannabis,” Queensland health minister Cameron Dick said on Thursday.
“Medical practitioners to this point have had to rely on a range of medical literature sources including information from literature sources internationally.”
Dick said no decision had been made on whether doctors’ reports on the results of medicinal cannabis use would be made public.
Doctors and medicinal cannabis activists have been critical of the lack of education offered to health professionals on the drug.
